api_list.name: /api/user/{userId}
api_list.description: Retreive a user object, their logs and calendar of savings

api_list.name: /api/create/user
api_list.description: Creates a new user within the system, returning the userId
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://1p-challenge1.p.rapidapi.com/api/create/user"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "1p-challenge1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /api/user/{userId}/undo-latest
api_list.description: Undo the latest savings log from a user (fat-finger click)
